sectionPart.partSubTitle: Future perfect, future progressive and future perfect progressive

sets.exerciseInstruction: Choose the best example for each tense.

sentences: We use the future perfect to talk about something that will finish before a specific point of time in the future.
exerciseSentences.exerciseAnswers: by 2035 robots will have evolved to such a point that they will be able to carry out most human tasks
exerciseOptions: by 2035 robots will have evolved to such a point that they will be able to carry out most human tasks
robots will be doing almost 50% of jobs worldwide within the next 20 years

sentences: We use the future progressive to talk about an action or situation that will be in progress at a specific time in the future.
